sn13.1:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn13.1:1.3: Atha kho bhagava parittam nakhasikhayam pamsum aropetva bhikkhu amantesi:
sn13.1:1.5: katamam nu kho bahutaram, yo vayam maya paritto nakhasikhayam pamsu aropito, ayam va mahapathavi”ti?
sn13.1:2.2: Appamattako bhagavata paritto nakhasikhayam pamsu aropito.
sn13.1:2.3: Neva satimam kalam upeti na sahassimam kalam upeti na satasahassimam kalam upeti mahapathavim upanidhaya bhagavata paritto nakhasikhayam pamsu aropito”ti.
sn13.1:2.4: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa ditthisampannassa puggalassa abhisametavino etadeva bahutaram dukkham yadidam parikkhinam pariyadinnam;
sn13.1:2.6: Neva satimam kalam upeti na sahassimam kalam upeti na satasahassimam kalam upeti purimam dukkhakkhandham parikkhinam pariyadinnam upanidhaya yadidam sattakkhattumparamata.
